chapter.desc: Injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes (S00-T88)

notes.note: Use secondary code(s) from Chapter 20, External causes of morbidity, to indicate cause of injury. Codes within the T section that include the external cause do not require an additional external cause code

useAdditionalCode.note: code to identify any retained foreign body, if applicable (Z18.-)

notes.note: The chapter uses the S-section for coding different types of injuries related to single body regions and the T-section to cover injuries to unspecified body regions as well as poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes.

excludes2.note: effects of foreign body in ear (T16)
effects of foreign body in larynx (T17.3)
effects of foreign body in mouth NOS (T18.0)
effects of foreign body in nose (T17.0-T17.1)
effects of foreign body in pharynx (T17.2)
effects of foreign body on external eye (T15.-)

diag.name: S12
diag.desc: Fracture of cervical vertebra and other parts of neck

notes.note: A fracture not indicated as displaced or nondisplaced should be coded to displaced
A fracture not indicated as open or closed should be coded to closed

sevenChrNote.note: The appropriate 7th character is to be added to all codes from subcategories S12.0-S12.6

sevenChrDef.extension: subsequent encounter for fracture with routine healing
subsequent encounter for fracture with delayed healing
subsequent encounter for fracture with nonunion

diag.name: S12.0
diag.desc: Fracture of first cervical vertebra

diag.name: S12.00
diag.desc: Unspecified fracture of first cervical vertebra

diag.name: S12.000
diag.desc: Unspecified displaced fracture of first cervical vertebra

diag.name: S12.001
diag.desc: Unspecified nondisplaced fracture of first cervical vertebra

diag.name: S12.1
diag.desc: Fracture of second cervical vertebra

diag.name: S12.10
diag.desc: Unspecified fracture of second cervical vertebra

diag.name: S12.100
diag.desc: Unspecified displaced fracture of second cervical vertebra

diag.name: S12.101
diag.desc: Unspecified nondisplaced fracture of second cervical vertebra

diag.name: S12.8
diag.desc: Fracture of other parts of neck

sevenChrNote.note: The appropriate 7th character is to be added to code S12.8

diag.name: S12.9
diag.desc: Fracture of neck, unspecified

sevenChrNote.note: The appropriate 7th character is to be added to code S12.9

diag.name: C44
diag.desc: Other and unspecified malignant neoplasm of skin

diag.name: C44.1
diag.desc: Other and unspecified malignant neoplasm of skin of eyelid, including canthus

diag.name: C44.10
diag.desc: Unspecified malignant neoplasm of skin of eyelid, including canthus

diag.name: C44.101
diag.desc: Unspecified malignant neoplasm of skin of unspecified eyelid, including canthus

diag.name: C44.102
diag.desc: Unspecified malignant neoplasm of skin of right eyelid, including canthus

diag.name: C44.1021
diag.desc: Unspecified malignant neoplasm of skin of right upper eyelid, including canthus

diag.name: M80
diag.desc: Osteoporosis with current pathological fracture

useAdditionalCode.note: code to identify major osseous defect, if applicable (M89.7-)

sevenChrNote.note: The appropriate 7th character is to be added to each code from category M80:

sevenChrDef.extension: subsequent encounter for fracture with routine healing
subsequent encounter for fracture with delayed healing
subsequent encounter for fracture with nonunion
subsequent encounter for fracture with malunion

diag.name: M80.0
diag.desc: Age-related osteoporosis with current pathological fracture

inclusionTerm.note: Involutional osteoporosis with current pathological fracture
Osteoporosis NOS with current pathological fracture
Postmenopausal osteoporosis with current pathological fracture
Senile osteoporosis with current pathological fracture

diag.name: M80.00
diag.desc: Age-related osteoporosis with current pathological fracture, unspecified site

diag.name: M80.01
diag.desc: Age-related osteoporosis with current pathological fracture, shoulder

diag.name: M80.011
diag.desc: Age-related osteoporosis with current pathological fracture, right shoulder

diag.name: E08
diag.desc: Diabetes mellitus due to underlying condition

diag.name: E08.3
diag.desc: Diabetes mellitus due to underlying condition with ophthalmic complications

diag.name: E08.32
diag.desc: Diabetes mellitus due to underlying condition with mild nonproliferative diabetic retinopathy

inclusionTerm.note: Diabetes mellitus due to underlying condition with nonproliferative diabetic retinopathy NOS

sevenChrNote.note: One of the following 7th characters is to be assigned to codes in subcategory E08.32 to designate laterality of the disease:

diag.name: E08.321
diag.desc: Diabetes mellitus due to underlying condition with mild nonproliferative diabetic retinopathy with macular edema

diag.name: E08.329
diag.desc: Diabetes mellitus due to underlying condition with mild nonproliferative diabetic retinopathy without macular edema
